p.codeblock: virtual int preload(agora::util::AString& requestId, int64_t songCode) = 0;

section.p: You can call this method to preload the music resources you want to play. After a successful call, the SDK triggers the callback to report the preload event. Before calling this method, you need to call or to obtain the target music resources and get the song code (songCode) from the callback.

After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report preload events. Before calling this method, you need to call getMusicCollectionByMusicChartId or searchMusic to obtain the copyright music resources you want to play, and use the callback triggered by these methods to get the music resource identifier (songCode).
section.note: Before destroying the object, make sure you have received the callback before calling the method.
Before destroying the object, make sure to call the method after receiving the callback.

plentry.pd: Output parameter. Request ID used to uniquely identify this request.
The song code of the music resource, used to identify the music.
The identifier of the copyright music resource.

ul.li: On success, returns the unique identifier requestId for the request.
On failure, returns an empty string.
